channel.title: company on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in company on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-15
item.description: Microsoft releases DirectStorage: ‘a new era of fast load times and detailed worlds in PC games’ (3 minute read) Microsoft’s DirectStorage API has arrived for Windows.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-03
item.description: Here’s everything Apple could announce at its March 8 ‘Peek performance’ special event (5 minute read) Apple will hold its ‘Peek Performance’ virtual event on March 8.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-22
item.description: Apple Reportedly Completes Production Tests for AR/VR Headset (1 minute read) Apple has completed key production tests for its long-rumored augmented and virtual reality headset.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-16
item.description: Reddit files to take the company public (1 minute read) Reddit has started the process of going public by filing a confidential S-1 with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-30
item.description: An introduction to Parag Agrawal, Twitter’s new CEO (5 minute read) Parag Agrawal is taking over Twitter as CEO.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-12
item.description: Spotify is acquiring an audiobook company (3 minute read) Spotify has announced plans to acquire Findaway for an undisclosed price.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-09
item.description: Reddit to reportedly tokenize karma points and onboard 500M new users (2 minute read) Reddit is planning to convert its users' karma points into Ethereum-based tokens.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-05
item.description: Alphabet is launching a company that uses AI for drug discovery (3 minute read) Isomorphic Laboratories is a new company from Alphabet that will use artificial intelligence for drug discovery.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-01
item.description: Facebook’s Meta watch has a camera notch, according to first leaked image (2 minute read) Leaked images of Facebook’s smartwatch show a camera notch that is clearly visible when the watch’s screen is off.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-28
item.description: LinkedIn rolls out its freelance services marketplace globally after picking up 2M users in smaller US beta (4 minute read) LinkedIn is opening up its Service Marketplace, a service that lets freelancers advertise to those looking to hire people for short-term engagements.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-21
item.description: Facebook is planning to rebrand the company with a new name (3 minute read) Facebook is planning to change its company name next week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-14
item.description: Zoom is adding live translation services and coming to Facebook VR (2 minute read) Zoom plans to add real-time transcription for up to 30 languages and real-time translation across as many as 12 languages by the end of next year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-06
item.description: Apple Reportedly in Talks With Toyota About Apple Car Production Starting 2024 (2 minute read) Apple is rumored to be visiting several car manufacturers in Asia to mass-produce a branded car by 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-31
item.description: PayPal is exploring a stock-trading platform for its U.S. customers (3 minute read) PayPal is exploring ways to let users trade individual stocks.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-30
item.description: Amazon partners with Affirm to roll out first buy now, pay later option on the e-commerce site (2 minute read) Amazon has partnered with Affirm to offer installment payment options.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-27
item.description: Snapchat’s new AR features can identify the world around you (5 minute read) Scan is a new feature from Snapchat that can identify a range of objects.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-25
item.description: Airbnb says it plans to temporarily house 20,000 Afghan refugees (2 minute read) Airbnb will house 20,000 Afghan refugees around the world in the properties listed on its platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-20
item.description: OnlyFans bans sexually explicit content to appease banks and payment services (3 minute read) OnlyFans will ban sexually explicit material on its platform from October 1 to comply with the requests of its banking partners and payout providers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-13
item.description: Nvidia Reveals Its CEO Was Computer Generated in Keynote Speech (2 minute read) Nvidia’s GTC conference in April featured a keynote presentation by its CEO Jensen Huang.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-22
item.description: Apple Developing a Whole New Kind of MacBook Air (2 minute read) Apple is working on a new high-end MacBook Air.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-21
item.description: Google working on ‘Spot’ app and ‘Find My Device network’ (3 minute read) Google is working on a new capability for its Find My Device network called Spot.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-02
item.description: Google helps map one cubic millimeter of human brain tissue that comes in at 1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-28
item.description: Amazon Introduces Tiny ‘ZenBooths’ for Stressed Out Warehouse Workers (3 minute read) Amazon is introducing tiny booths for its workers to momentarily escape from their jobs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-10
item.description: Elon Musk’s SpaceX is literally launching a Dogecoin-funded satellite to the Moon (2 minute read) SpaceX is now accepting Dogecoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-22
item.description: Pebble founder launches Beeper, a universal chat app that works with iMessage and others (4 minute read) Beeper is a new app that can connect with 15 different messaging services.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-21
item.description: Amazon offers to help U.S. with vaccine in letter to President Biden (1 minute read) Amazon has offered to help with the US efforts involving the COVID-19 vaccine in a letter addressed to President Joe Biden.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-12
item.description: Samsung’s CES 2021 robots will clean your house and pour you a glass of wine (6 minute read) Samsung unveiled three new robots at its virtual CES press conference on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-06
item.description: OpenAI’s DALL-E creates plausible images of literally anything you ask it to (5 minute read) OpenAI’s DALL-E is an AI that can generate images based on text descriptions.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-18
item.description: Coinbase files to go public confidentially and we’re hyped (2 minute read) Coinbase has filed to go public, likely debuting in early 2021.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-02
item.description: Google Maps takes on Facebook with launch of its own news feed (3 minute read) Google Maps has introduced its own news feed feature.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-17
item.description: Foxconn allegedly testing folding iPhone, projected Sept. 2022 release (1 minute read) According to supply chain reports, Foxconn is testing a folding iPhone for Apple.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-10
item.description: McDonald’s confirms creation of McPlant plant-based burger, unveils new Crispy Chicken Sandwich will debut in 2021 (6 minute read) McDonald’s announced a new plant-based burger and a new Crispy Chicken Sandwich during its virtual investor update on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-21
item.description: Lucid beats Tesla Model S Plaid prototype on racetrack with its own tri-motor Air test vehicle (2 minute read) Lucid has beaten the Tesla Model S Plaid prototype’s Laguna Seca race track record with its Air electric vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-16
item.description: Here’s everything Apple just announced (9 minute read) Apple has announced a new virtual fitness service, a subscription service called Apple One, and a new lineup of Apple Watches and iPads.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-28
item.description: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer to leave the company (4 minute read) TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has resigned from the company just months after his appointment.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-20
item.description: Palantir to relocate headquarters from Silicon Valley to Colorado (2 minute read) Palantir Technologies is relocating its headquarters to Denver, Colorado from Palo Alto, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-17
item.description: AMC movie theaters will reopen on Aug. 20 with 15-cent tickets (2 minute read) More than 100 AMC cinemas across the US will open on August 20.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-22
item.description: LinkedIn cuts 960 jobs as pandemic puts the brakes on corporate hiring (1 minute read) LinkedIn reported on Tuesday that it would cut about 960 jobs due to the sustained impact that the coronavirus pandemic is having on the demand for its recruitment products.
